header.h5: At New Madrid County R-1, we are dedicated to the success of our students and the success of our community.

span.p: FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK:NNMCR1 Facebook Page
span.span: New Madrid County R-1 is participating in a Free Breakfast and Lunch Program for the current school year 2019-2020. This alternative is referred to as the Community Eligibility Provision. All students enrolled at this school may participate in the breakfast/lunch program at no charge. PUBLIC RELEASE

span.a: Click HERE for information about MOCAP/Virtual Learning at NMCC.

span.p: We are continually working to build a creative, encouraging and motivating space to let our eagles fly.

p.em: NMCR1 Board Policy prohibits discrimination, harassment and retaliation. Board policies AC and KL address these matters and may be accessed under the "About" tab on this website, or Click Here to Access All Forms and Related Policies.

div.p: Congratulations to Eli; He has been chosen as our Eagle of the Week!

div.h6: Ariel, Tristen, Aneesa, Bryan, Carmen, Destiny
div.p: Ariel, Tristen, Aneesa, Bryan, Carmen,and Destiny have been showing their pride this month and have been selected as students of the month! Great job guys!
Thank you Central Middle STUCO for all that you do! Let's make this the best year yet!

div.h6: These students received "Eagle of the Week"
div.p: These students received "Eagle of the Week" for great behavior and helping in the classroom!

We use EagleAlert to inform parents of school closings such as snow days, emergency situations, and short notice items. The alerts come as a text message to your cell phone and/or as an email message.
